/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -O2 -g -Wl,-rpath,/home/loki/SwarmSimX/trunk/stacks/ssx_deps/armadillo_wrapper/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib -pthread   -shared -Wl,-soname,libmk_controls.so -o lib/libmk_controls.so CMakeFiles/mk_controls.dir/src/pidcontroller.o CMakeFiles/mk_controls.dir/src/bkstepcontroller.o CMakeFiles/mk_controls.dir/src/drivercontroller.o -L/opt/ros/fuerte/lib -L/home/loki/SwarmSimX/trunk/stacks/ssx_deps/armadillo_wrapper/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib -L/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib -larmadillo -ltf -lboost_thread-mt -lBulletDynamics -lBulletCollision -lLinearMath -lmessage_filters -lroscpp -lrostime -lrosconsole -lroscpp_serialization -lxmlrpcpp -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/lib:/home/loki/SwarmSimX/trunk/stacks/ssx_deps/armadillo_wrapper/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/geometry/tf/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/bullet/lib
